text: The Sorcerer's Apprentice is a children's reality show that originally aired on BBC One with Barney Harwood as host for the first series from 9 to 20 July 2007, it was moved to BBC Two with Ortis Deley as host for series two and three from 25 January to 20 December 2009. ==Transmissions== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !
